data.title: James "Jimmy" J. Thatcher Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: James J. "Jimmy" Thatcher, age 60, a lifelong resident of Peotone, passed away unexpectedly at his home on Thursday, July 6, 2023.     He was born on August 6, 1962, in Blue Isl...
data.text:
James J. “Jimmy” Thatcher, age 60, a lifelong resident of Peotone, passed away unexpectedly at his home on Thursday, July 6, 2023.

He was born on August 6, 1962, in Blue Island, IL, the son of John J. and Myra (Eylander) Thatcher. He was a Peotone High School graduate, Class of 1980. Jimmy worked as a self-employed master painter. He was a fan of the Grateful Dead and a self-proclaimed Deadhead. He loved the outdoors and enjoyed fishing and hunting. He especially enjoyed spending time at his family’s farm where he grew up. Jimmy was incredibly proud of his daughter, Ashley and his grandson, Wyatt, and loved talking about them with everyone.

He is survived by his daughter, Ashley Thatcher of Beecher; his grandson, Wyatt; his sister and brother-in-law, Janet and Gary Hase of Monee; 2 sisters-in-law, Rosalie (the late John A.) Thatcher and Debra (the late Joseph) Thatcher both of Wilmington; and numerous nieces and nephews.

He was preceded in death by his father, John J. Thatcher (August 19, 2018); his mother, Myra Thatcher (June 18, 2013); 2 brothers, John A. Thatcher (April 4, 2012) and Joseph Thatcher (April 12, 2012); his sister, Joyce A. Albers (June 18, 2021); and his brother-in-law, Keith Albers (March 4, 2009).
